seriously? you link a file in a folder on your Desktop?

seriously? you link a file in a folder on your Desktop?

Not everybody knows how the internet works right from the getgo.

Try uploading the picture to imgur.net
Give him a break. He's a Curious George.

To post an image on the Forums, go to www.imgur.com. Then, select "upload images>computer" as seen here:

and select your image from the file browser.

Click "open," and then "start upload."

Your image should upload, and then you will be brought to its page.

Copy your current URL.

It should look something like this:


imgur.com/XxXxXxX

Add an "i." to the beginning, and the file extension of the image you uploaded to the end.


i.imgur.com/XxXxXxX.file extension

Copy this new URL.

Select the "Insert image" function on the forum, and place your URL there.

Upload it. Have fun!

Also, I recommend using Dropbox, a free software, to upload the .craft file.

I hope this helped.

Cheers, Naten.
